author: karl
msg: * src/rivetPkgInit.c: Added a Rivet_SafeInit so lib can be loaded from safe
interpreters, which also makes it work better under Mac OS X.
* src/rivetCrypt.c: Added function header to init routine.
* README.MacOSX: Temporary file to document Mac OS X build quirks.

author: karl
msg: * src/configure.tcl: If a configuration variable in tclConfig.sh ever had an
equal sign in the "value" portion of the key=value pair, configure.tcl would
malfunction.  Like under Mac OS X.
A missing variable caused a variable referencing that missing variable to be
silently dropped.  We now complain, although the right answer is probably to
substitute an empty string for all missing variables.
Still, this way at least gives a hint as to the problem.
* src/Makefile: Add simple rules for "clean", "distclean", and "install" that

author: karl
msg: Add handle method to obtain the underlying database handle.

author: davidw
msg: Wiedemann <arnulf@wiedemann-pri.de> to set up VARS array.
